column4: can anyone tell me why my USB speakers won't work in VLC & firefox but will work in rhythmbox. Would really appreciate a reply since this is the second week of asking this question and I'm seriously ubuntly challenged :/
It's my description of people like me who use Ubuntu because they hate the redmond ones but have no idea what they're doing
which devices does the sound admin list?
i think you need to config alsa to ignore your pci (?) sound card
